channel.title: Philosophy on Ayman Lafaz
channel.description: Recent content in Philosophy on Ayman Lafaz

item.title: Are we on the verge of a new AI revolution?
item.description: You may be tempted to think that with the new media buzz about all the new and exciting AI models coming up like (GPT-3, Stable Diffusion, DALLE-2, …), that we are on a verge of a breakthrough with the ever so talked about AGI (Artificial General Intelligence) which have been portrayed by movies where AI takes over and enslaves humanity and all that kind of stuff. but still the current progress is still far from it in my opinion, and not to downplay the impact these kinds of developments have on society at large because indeed this progress that was achieved will change the way things are done.
